script.title: lib-wizard.slax
script.author: phil.shafer
script.synopsis: Wizard framework, so creating interactive scripts
script.description:
This import script defines a framework which allows the creation of wizard scripts. A "guide" is defined that controls the interactive session. The wizard framework uses this guide to drive the creation of an XML hierarchy using data entered by the user. This XML can be either junos compatible for direct loading, or can construct free xml that can be translated (using xslt) into junos syntax.
See op/setup/ezsetup.slax for an example.
